Welcome to Quantumcat documentation!Â¶

Quantum Cat is a Python based platform for creating, visualising and executing quantum circuits.

Quantum Cat aims at helping even a beginner to use the power of quantum computers solve practical problems, without worrying about what happens inside. Quantum Cat brings together all the services offered by the latest quantum service providers. It is a platform-independent quantum programming framework, currently supporting IBM Qiskit, Google Cirq, AWS Braket.

If you are completely new to Quantumcat, install it first and then explore the contents.
